mapper.select: (SELECT id,created_at FROM t_cmm_comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} and state = 0 ) UNION (SELECT id,created_at FROM t_reply WHERE target_id in (SELECT id FROM t_cmm_comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} and state = 0) and state = 0) ORDER BY created_at DESC Limit 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT member_id,COUNT(*) as post_count,0 as eva_count,0 as like_count FROM t_cmm_post WHERE type = 2 GROUP BY member_id) a WHERE a.post_count >= 2

select p.id, p.title, p.content, p.cover_image as coverImage, p.video as video, p.member_id as memberId, p.updated_at as updatedAt, p.created_at as createdAt from t_cmm_post p
p.id IN
#{item}
order by updatedAt desc
SELECT SUM( greatest( IFNULL(watch_num, 0), IFNULL(boom_watch_num, 0) ) ) FROM t_cmm_post WHERE member_id = #{cardId}

select
,sum(cp.comment_num+cp.like_num+cp.collect_num+cp.watch_num) as total from t_cmm_post cp where cp.state != -1 and id in ( select cpc.post_id from t_cmm_post_circle cpc where cpc.circle_id = #{circleId} )
and cp.tags = #{tagId}
and cp.type = #{cream}
and cp.type != '3'
GROUP BY cp.id order by field(cp.type,'3') desc , CASE WHEN cp.type = 3 then cp.edited_at END DESC,
cp.created_at desc
GROUP BY cp.id order by cp.last_reply_at desc
and cp.type = 2 GROUP BY cp.id order by cp.created_at desc
GROUP BY cp.id ORDER BY total desc

select
,sum(cp.comment_num+cp.like_num+cp.collect_num+cp.watch_num) as total from t_cmm_post cp where cp.state != -1 and id in ( select cpc.post_id from t_cmm_post_circle cpc where cpc.circle_id = #{circleId} )
and cp.type = #{cream}
and cp.type != '3'
GROUP BY cp.id order by field(cp.type,'3') desc , CASE WHEN cp.type = 3 then cp.edited_at END DESC,
cp.created_at desc
GROUP BY cp.id order by field(cp.type,'3') desc , CASE WHEN cp.type = 3 then cp.edited_at END DESC, cp.last_reply_at desc
and cp.type = 2 GROUP BY cp.id order by cp.created_at desc
GROUP BY cp.id order by field(cp.type,'3') desc , CASE WHEN cp.type = 3 then cp.edited_at END DESC, total desc

SELECT DISTINCT mpost.id AS id, postGame.post_id AS post_id, postGame.game_id AS game_id, SUM( watch_num + comment_num + like_num + collect_num ) AS wclc FROM
t_cmm_post mpost
JOIN t_cmm_post_game postGame ON mpost.id = postGame.post_id
AND state != -1
AND ( title LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR content LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') )
GROUP BY mpost.id ORDER BY
LOCATE( #{keyword}, title ) DESC,
wclc DESC,
LOCATE( #{keyword}, content ) DESC,
wclc DESC LIMIT #{startOffset} ,#{pageSize}

SELECT count(DISTINCT mpost.id) as ct FROM t_cmm_post mpost JOIN t_cmm_post_game postGame ON mpost.id = postGame.post_id AND state != -1
AND ( title LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR content LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') )

FROM t_cmm_post cp WHERE cp.state != -1 AND ( cp.community_id in (SELECT cc.id FROM t_cmm_community cc WHERE cc.game_id = #{gameId} ) or cp.id in (SELECT cpg.post_id FROM t_cmm_post_game cpg WHERE cpg.game_id = #{gameId} ) )order by cp.created_at desc

FROM t_cmm_post cp WHERE cp.state != -1 and cp.recommend = 1 and NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_cmm_post_circle cpc , t_cmm_circle cc WHERE cc.id = cpc.circle_id and cpc.post_id = cp.id and cc.state != 1 ) ORDER BY cp.sort DESC , cp.created_at desc
